t: Can you run Microsoft Intune on Amazon WorkSpaces? | AWS re:Post
s: November 3, 2020 - Microsoft Intune is used to manage Microsoft client operating systems, and some selected Android devices. Standard Amazon Windows WorkSpaces use Windows Server with desktop experience, which isn't an operating system supported by Microsoft Intune.
